newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks mixed, gains in blue chips.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks mixed, gains in blue chips.

text.p: Croatian stocks were mixed on smaller volume on Wednesday with new gains in blue chips.
* Of 14 active issues six were up, five down and three flat.
* Top gainer was Varazdinska Banka, up 179 kuna to 894 kuna, but only 15 shares were sold.
* Biggest loser was hotelier Jadranturist, 25 kuna down to 250, trading 100 shares.
* Most actively traded was Zagrebacka Banka with 6,230 units sold, closing 40 kuna up at 1,020. -- Zagreb Newsroom, 385-1-4557075
